description: Currently working as a Project lead in the Ford Motor Company. Experienced in complete architecture of a component library creation and deployment. Have also touched AEM (Adobe Experience Manager) and familiar with MFE (Micro Front end) Applications.

With 3+ years of experience as a frontend developer at Verizon. Experienced in full project lifecycle and automated testing using Cypress and Jest. Skilled in platform hardening and quality assurance.

I have worked around 2+ years in this organization as a front end developer and UI/UX developer. I have gained a lot of experience, knowledge and of course an unforgettable moments with friends.Awesome company to work with. I suggest this company for freshers who could explore new technologies and enrich their knowledge and experience.
